entries.meaning: (derogatory) One who uses performance enhancing substances for competitive gain, especially illegally.
examples: Would you care to point to some proof other than the Canuck's positive back in Nagano? If you are using that as a basis then all sports would be riddled with "dopers" especially XC skiing.

entries.meaning: (derogatory) One who frequently uses recreational drugs; a druggie; a stoner.
examples: I will keep posting the fact that if you possess drugs where I am employed and you are caught I'll throw your sorry ass in a cage where the dopers belong.

entries.meaning: (dated) A person employed to apply dope solution during aircraft manufacture.
comparative form of dope: more dope
